key_changes: Added transition property to MuiTabs-indicator with cubic-bezier easing
Updated transition timing from 150ms to 200ms for MuiTab-root
Added scale transform to selected tab state in standard Tabs
Updated transition timing from 150ms to 200ms for PillTabs
Added scale transform to selected tab state in PillTabs

patterns_discovered.description: Standardized transition duration increased from 150ms to 200ms across both tab variants for better perceived quality
Combining multiple animation properties (transition timing, transform scale) for compound effect on tab selection
Using cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) for indicator animation and ease-out for tab interactions for nuanced motion
Applying identical transform: scale(1.02) to both StyledTabs and PillTabs selected states

gotchas_discovered.details: Indicator animation uses custom cubic-bezier curve while tabs use ease-out; timing difference (200ms) ensures smooth coordination
1.02 scale (2% increase) is minimal - too small may be imperceptible, larger values could distort tab layout
Changes must be applied to both StyledTabs and PillTabs to maintain consistent UX across component variants

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Direct CSS animation enhancement through styled-components properties

recommendations.recommendation: Add visual regression tests to ensure animation smoothness across browsers and devices
Monitor animation frame rates on lower-end devices; consider reducing scale transform or transition duration if performance degrades
Consider respecting prefers-reduced-motion media query to disable animations for users with motion sensitivity
Document the cubic-bezier curve rationale and consider extracting animation constants to a shared theme configuration for maintainability
